member.summary: Use the given configuration settings on the web host.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.HostingAbstractionsWebHostBuilderExtensions.CaptureStartupErrors(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set whether startup errors should be captured in the configuration settings of the web host. When enabled, startup exceptions will be caught and an error page will be returned. If disabled, startup exceptions will be propagated.
member.param: true to use startup error page; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.HostingAbstractionsWebHostBuilderExtensions.UseStartup(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Specify the assembly containing the startup type to be used by the web host.
member.param: The name of the assembly containing the startup type.

member.summary: Specify the server to be used by the web host.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.HostingAbstractionsWebHostBuilderExtensions.UseEnvironment(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Specify the environment to be used by the web host.
member.param: The environment to host the application in.

member.summary: Checks if the current hosting environment name is "Production".

member.summary: Compares the current hosting environment name against the specified value.
member.returns: True if the specified name is the same as the current environment, otherwise false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime
member.summary: Allows consumers to perform cleanup during a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStarted
member.summary: Triggered when the application host has fully started and is about to wait for a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. Requests may still be in flight. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopped
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. All requests should be complete at this point. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime.StopApplication
member.summary: Requests termination the current application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application. This property is automatically set by the host to the assembly containing the application entry point.
